Row.Text: Inquisitors can Remove Heresy one extra time. +8 [ICON_Strength] strength versus civilizations in a Dark Age.

+50% [ICON_Production] Production toward Builders. If a Nizari Unit defeats an enemy unit within the borders of the enemy city, that city loses 20 Loyalty. +4 [ICON_Strength] strength versus civilizations following another Religion.

A district unique to Nizarifor religious activity. Replaces the Holy Site district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GreatProphet] Great Prophet points, +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point, +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point, +1 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant point. +1 [ICON_Production] Production for each adjacent other District.
